title: Anything But Mine
description: Despite being considered one of the most beautiful women in the world, model Jennifer LaBella keeps a low profile, content to lead a simple life surrounded by a small circle of family and friends. She has always been unlucky in love – that is, until her long-time friend Drew Crawford comes to her rescue after a bad break-up. Jennifer falls hard for him, and when a family emergency forces Drew to move across the country, she tries to convince him to give a long-distance relationship a chance. But billionaire businessman Vince Moscolo has other plans for Jennifer – and they don’t include Drew. As Vince’s obsession with Jennifer grows, he will stop at nothing to make her his…Anything But Mine takes the reader on a sexy trip through New York City and the Hamptons, exploring one man’s need to possess the woman he loves, while he desperately attempts to prevent her from learning his dark secrets.
author: Barbara Justice
